text: Corn tortillas filled with cheese or meat, topped with a rich chili sauce and garnished with onions, lettuce, and cheese. A classic dish that represents the flavors of Chilpancingo.
A warm corn-based drink flavored with cinnamon, vanilla, or chocolate. Enjoyed throughout Chilpancingo, often paired with tamales or pastries.
Soft corn tortillas filled with tender, slow-cooked pork, garnished with onions, cilantro, and salsa. A popular and flavorful street food enjoyed by locals in Chilpancingo.
